readability_reflection: I found the version with the "+" more readable. I just use it more in concatenation than the {}.
comprehension_debugging: I knew string interpolation but I don't use it so much in my programs, so it took a bit longer to read than the concatenation.
preference_rationale: Concatenation, just because I'm already used to using it in programming tasks.
learning_curve: I think knowing concatenation before knowing interpolation made it easier to understand combining strings as a whole.
suggestions_improvement: Interpolation is more user friendly as some might find a "+" confusing without numbers.
